prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that has vibrant purple scales and electric blue spikes.
Show me a unique Pokemon with a bipedal stance, featuring both poison and electric abilities.
Imagine a creature that thrives in urban areas, with a colorful appearance and a rock star vibe.
Generate a Pokemon with a striking mix of colors, resembling a musical instrument in its design.
Design a bipedal Pokemon that can harness electric energy and has a punk aesthetic.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of poison and electric types with a cool, edgy look.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies a rebellious spirit, with a bold color palette and spiky features.
